description.english: You survived the journey through beautiful and savage dungeon.
description.german: Du hast die Reise durch den ebenso schönen wie wilden Kerker überlebt.
description.french: Vous avez survécu à la traversée d'un donjon aussi splendide que sauvage.
description.italian: Sei sopravvissuto all'attraversata di un dungeon tanto splendido quanto selvaggio.
description.spanish: Has sobrevivido al viaje por la hermosa y salvaje mazmorra.
description.schinese: 你在美丽而狂野的地城之旅中幸存。
description.russian: Вы пережили путешествие по удивительному и опасному подземелью.
description.brazilian: Você sobreviveu à jornada pela bela e selvagem masmorra.

displayName.french: Une ville en proie aux flammes

description.english: You saved Kenabres and acquired mysterious and thrilling powers.
description.german: Du hast Kenabres gerettet und geheimnisvolle und aufregende Kräfte erhalten.
description.french: Vous avez sauvé Kénabres et acquis de mystérieux pouvoirs.
description.italian: Hai salvato Kenabres e acquisito misteriosi poteri.
description.spanish: Has salvado Kenabres y has obtenido poderes misteriosos y únicos.
description.schinese: 你拯救了坎娜布利，并取得了神秘而惊人的力量。
description.russian: Вы спасли Кенабрес и обрели загадочные, захватывающие силы.
description.brazilian: Você salvou Kenabres e adquiriu poderes misteriosos e emocionantes.

description.english: You reclaimed a formidable crusade relic and chose your mythic path.
description.german: Du hast ein herausragendes Relikt des Kreuzzugs zurückgeholt und deinen Legendenweg gewählt.
description.french: Vous avez récupéré une formidable relique de la croisade et choisi votre voie mythique.
description.italian: Hai recuperato una formidabile reliquia della Crociata e scelto il tuo percorso mitico.
description.spanish: Has recuperado una importante reliquia de los cruzados y has elegido tu senda mítica.
description.schinese: 你夺回了一件强大的圣教军圣物，并选择了你的神话道途。
description.russian: Вы вернули крестоносцам их величайшую реликвию и выбрали свой мифический путь.
description.brazilian: Você recuperou uma poderosa relíquia da cruzada e escolheu seu caminho mítico.

description.english: You successfully led an offensive into the demon-infested lands of the Worldwound.
description.german: Du hast erfolgreich eine Offensive in die dämonenverseuchten Lande der Weltenwunde angeführt.
description.french: Vous avez mené avec succès une offensive sur les terres infestées de démons de la Plaie du Monde.
description.italian: Hai guidato con successo un'offensiva nelle terre infestate dai demoni della Piaga del Mondo.
description.spanish: Has dirigido con éxito una ofensiva contra las tierras infestadas de demonios de la Herida del Mundo.
description.schinese: 你成功领导了一次对恶魔横行的世界之伤的进攻。
description.russian: Вы успешно возглавили наступление на демонические орды Мировой язвы.
description.brazilian: Você liderou com sucesso uma ofensiva nas terras infestadas por demônios da Ferida do Mundo.

description.english: You survived the impossible journey and returned to Golarion.
description.german: Du hast die unmögliche Reise überlebt und bist nach Golarion zurückgekehrt.
description.french: Vous avez survécu à un voyage éprouvant et réussi à revenir sur Golarion.
description.italian: Sei sopravvissuto al viaggio impossibile e hai fatto ritorno a Golarion.
description.spanish: Has sobrevivido a un viaje imposible para regresar a Golarion.
description.schinese: 你完成了九死一生的旅程，平安返回葛拉利昂。
description.russian: Вы пережили невозможно опасное путешествие и вернулись на Голарион.
description.brazilian: Você sobreviveu a uma jornada impossível para retornar a Golarion.

description.english: You reached the dead city of Iz and secured your place as the greatest figure in Worldwound history.
description.german: Du hast die tote Stadt Iz erreicht und dir deinen Platz als größte Persönlichkeit in der Geschichte der Weltenwunde gesichert.
description.french: Vous avez atteint la ville d'Iz et inscrit votre nom dans la légende.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto la città di Iz e hai scritto il tuo nome nella leggenda.
description.spanish: Has llegado a la ciudad muerta de Iz y has afianzado tu posición como la figura histórica más importante de la Herida del Mundo.
description.schinese: 你抵达了死去的伊兹城，取得了世界之伤史上最伟大人物的地位。
description.russian: Вы достигли мертвого города Иза и утвердили себя как величайшую фигуру в истории Мировой язвы.
description.brazilian: Na cidade morta de Iz você fortaleceu sua posição como a figura mais importante da Ferida do Mundo.

description.english: Congratulations, Commander! Your story is complete!
description.german: Glückwunsch! Deine Geschichte ist abgeschlossen!
description.french: Félicitations ! Votre histoire s'achève ici !
description.italian: Congratulazioni, Comandante! La tua storia è terminata!
description.spanish: ¡Enhorabuena, Comandante! ¡Has completado tu historia!
description.schinese: 祝贺，指挥官！你的故事完结了！
description.russian: Поздравляем, Командор! Ваша история завершилась!
description.brazilian: Parabéns, Comandante! Você completou sua história!

description.english: You chose to embrace heavenly light and righteousness.
description.german: Du hast dich für das himmlische Licht und die Rechtschaffenheit entschieden.
description.french: Vous avez choisi la lumière céleste et le chemin de la droiture.
description.italian: Hai deciso di accettare la luce celeste e la giustizia.
description.spanish: Has decidido aceptar la luz y la justicia del Cielo.
description.schinese: 你选择了拥抱天堂的光芒与正义。
description.russian: Вы обрели силу в небесном свете и праведности.
description.brazilian: Você decidiu abraçar a luz e a justiça do Paraíso.

description.english: You chose to succumb to primordial rage and evil.
description.german: Du hast entschieden, dich dem Urzorn und dem Bösen unterzuordnen.
description.french: Vous avez choisi de laisser libre cours au mal et à la rage primordiale qui vous habitent.
description.italian: Hai scelto di soccombere alla rabbia e al male primordiale.
description.spanish: Has decidido sucumbir a la ira y al odio primordial.
description.schinese: 你选择屈服于原始的愤怒和邪恶。
description.russian: Вы поддались первобытной ярости и злу.
description.brazilian: Você decidiu sucumbir à fúria e ao mal primordial.

description.english: You chose the path of adventure, friendship, and freedom.
description.german: Du hast dich für Abenteuer, Freundschaft und Freiheit entschieden.
description.french: Vous avez choisi la voie de l'aventure, de l'amitié et de la liberté.
description.italian: Hai deciso di percorrere la strada dell'avventura, dell'amicizia e della libertà.
description.spanish: Has decidido recorrer el camino de la aventura, la amistad y la libertad.
description.schinese: 你选择了冒险、友情与自由的道路。
description.russian: Вы выбрали дорогу приключений, дружбы и свободы.
description.brazilian: Você decidiu trilhar o caminho da aventura, amizade e liberdade.

description.english: You chose to become the embodiment of cosmic law and balance.
description.german: Du hast entschieden, zur Verkörperung von Gesetz und Gleichgewicht des Kosmos zu werden.
description.french: Vous avez choisi d'incarner la loi et l'équilibre cosmiques.
description.italian: Hai deciso di diventare l'incarnazione della legge e dell'equilibrio cosmico.
description.spanish: Has decidido convertirte en la personificación de la ley y el equilibrio cósmico.
description.schinese: 你选择成为宇宙秩序和平衡的化身。
description.russian: Вы возжелали стать воплощением космических законов и баланса.
description.brazilian: Você decidiu se tornar a personificação da lei e do equilíbrio cósmico.

description.english: You just want to have fun, don't you?
description.german: Du willst einfach nur Spaß haben, richtig?
description.french: Vous n'êtes là que pour vous amuser, avouez !
description.italian: Vuoi solo divertirti, vero?
description.spanish: Lo único que te importa es pasártelo bien, ¿verdad?
description.schinese: 你只想找点乐子，不是吗？
description.russian: Вам просто хочется повеселиться, не так ли?
description.brazilian: Você só quer se divertir, não é?

description.english: You chose the forbidden power of undeath, aiming to become a lord of the dead.
description.german: Du hast die verbotene Macht des Untodes gewählt, um {mf|ein Fürst|eine Fürstin} der Toten zu werden.
description.french: Vous avez choisi le pouvoir interdit de la non-vie afin de dominer les morts.
description.italian: Hai deciso di ottenere il potere proibito della Non Morte, mirando a diventare il signore dei morti.
description.spanish: Has decidido obtener el poder prohibido de la muerte en vida para gobernar sobre los muertos.
description.schinese: 你选择了不死生命的禁忌力量，以求成为死亡的主宰。
description.russian: Вы выбрали запретную силу не-жизни, желая стать подлинным повелителем мертвецов.
description.brazilian: Você decidiu obter o poder proibido da morte em vida para comandar os mortos.

description.english: Yours is hunger.
description.german: Deine Antriebskraft ist Hunger.
description.french: Pour vous, il n'y a que la faim.
description.italian: Hai scelto la fame insaziabile.
description.spanish: Tuyo es el hambre.
description.schinese: 你饿了。
description.russian: Вы есть голод.
description.brazilian: Os seus estão famintos.

description.english: You were inspired by the wisdom and kindness of gold dragons.
description.german: Du wurdest inspiriert von der Weisheit und Güte der Golddrachen.
description.french: La sagesse et la bonté des dragons d'or vous inspirent.
description.italian: Sei stato ispirato dalla saggezza e dalla gentilezza dei draghi d'oro.
description.spanish: Te han inspirado la sabiduría y la bondad de los dragones de oro.
description.schinese: 你被金龙的睿智与仁慈所激励。
description.russian: Доброта и мудрость золотых драконов вдохновили вас.
description.brazilian: Você foi inspirado pela sabedoria e bondade dos dragões de ouro.

description.english: You rejected all mythic powers to pursue the greatest goal of all — to be the master of your own destiny.
description.german: Du hast alle Legendenkräfte zurückgewiesen, um das größte Ziel von allen zu verfolgen – die Herrschaft über dein eigenes Schicksal.
description.french: Vous avez rejeté tous les pouvoirs mythiques pour poursuivre le plus noble des objectifs : rester maître de votre propre destin.
description.italian: Hai rifiutato tutti i poteri mitici per perseguire i tuoi ideali ed essere artefice del tuo destino.
description.spanish: Has rechazado los poderes míticos en busca de la mayor meta de todas: tener control sobre tu propio destino.
description.schinese: 你拒绝了所有神话力量，以追求最远大的目标，那就是成为自己命运的掌控者。
description.russian: Вы отказались от мифических сил ради заветной цели - властвовать над собственной судьбой.
description.brazilian: Você rejeitou os poderes míticos em busca de um objetivo maior — o controle do seu destino.

description.english: Your mythic transformation is complete!
description.german: Deine Legendenverwandlung ist abgeschlossen!
description.french: Vous avez achevé votre transformation mythique !
description.italian: La tua trasformazione mitica è completa!
description.spanish: ¡Has completado tu transformación mítica!
description.schinese: 你已向神话蜕变了！
description.russian: Ваше мифическое преображение свершилось!
description.brazilian: Você concluiu sua transformação mítica!

description.english: Use your mythic powers five times in dialogues to influence the world and living souls.
description.german: Setze fünfmal deine Legendenkräfte in Dialogen ein, um die Welt und lebende Seelen zu beeinflussen.
description.french: Utilisez vos pouvoirs mythiques cinq fois au cours de dialogues pour influencer le monde et les êtres qui l'habitent.
description.italian: Usa i tuoi poteri mitici 5 volte nel dialogo per influenzare il mondo e i suoi abitanti.
description.spanish: Usa tus poderes míticos cinco veces en diálogos para influir sobre el mundo y sus habitantes.
description.schinese: 在对话中使用五次你的神话力量，从而对世界和生灵造成影响。
description.russian: Используйте ваши мифические силы 5 раз в диалогах чтобы влиять на мир и души его обитателей.
description.brazilian: Use seus poderes míticos cinco vezes em diálogos para influenciar o mundo e as almas vivas.

description.english: Complete the game in Last Azlanti mode, playing on Core difficulty or above.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel im Modus "Der letzte Aztlanti" und im Schwierigkeitsgrad "Basis" oder höher ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode Dernier Azlant, en mode Principal ou plus difficile encore.
description.italian: Completa il gioco in modalità Ultimo Azlanti, giocando a difficoltà Sfida o superiore.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en modo Último azlante y dificultad Normal o superior.
description.schinese: 以核心或更高难度，在最后的阿兹兰特人模式中完成游戏。
description.russian: Пройдите игру в режиме Последнего ацланта на сложности Суровая или выше.
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo no modo Último Azlante e na dificuldade Principal ou superior.

description.english: Complete the game playing on Core difficulty or above.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel im Schwierigkeitsgrad "Basis" oder höher ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode Principal ou plus difficile encore.
description.italian: Completa il gioco a difficoltà Sfida o superiore.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en dificultad Normal o superior.
description.schinese: 以核心或更高难度完成游戏。
description.russian: Пройдите игру на сложности Суровая или выше.
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo na dificuldade Principal ou superior.

description.english: Complete the game on Unfair difficulty.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel im Schwierigkeitsgrad "Unfair" ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode Injuste.
description.italian: Completa il gioco a difficoltà Ingiusta.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en dificultad Injusta.
description.schinese: 以不公平难度完成游戏。
description.russian: Пройдите игру на Нечестной сложности.
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo na dificuldade Injusto.

description.english: Craft a 9th-level scroll and 6th-level potion with a single character.
description.german: Stelle mit einem Charakter eine Schriftrolle der Stufe 9 und einen Trank der Stufe 6 her.
description.french: Confectionnez un parchemin de niveau 9 et une potion de niveau 6 avec un même personnage.
description.italian: Crea una pergamena di 9° livello e una pozione di 6° livello con un solo personaggio.
description.spanish: Elabora un pergamino de 9.º nivel y una poción de 6.º nivel con un solo personaje.
description.schinese: 用同一个角色制作9级卷轴和6级药水。
description.russian: Создайте свиток 9 уровня и зелье 6 уровня одним и тем же персонажем.
description.brazilian: Crie um pergaminho de 9º nível e uma poção de 6º nível com um único personagem.

description.english: Do 300 damage or more with a mounted charge attack, and kill the enemy with it.
description.german: Verursache mindestens 300 Punkte Schaden mit einem Sturmangriff auf einem Reittier und töte den Gegner dadurch.
description.french: Infligez au moins 300 points de dégâts avec une attaque de charge montée dont votre adversaire ne réchappe pas.
description.italian: Infliggi 300 danni o più con una carica in sella, uccidendo il nemico.
description.spanish: Inflige 300 de daño o más con un ataque de carga con montura y mata al enemigo con él.
description.schinese: 以骑乘冲锋攻击造成300点或更高伤害，并且杀死敌人。
description.russian: Нанесите врагу 300 урона при атаке с разбегу в бою верхом, и убейте врага при этом.
description.brazilian: Cause 300 pontos de dano ou mais com um ataque de investida montado, e mate o inimigo com ele.

description.english: Restore Areelu's magic cloak.
description.german: Stelle Areelus magischen Umhang wieder her.
description.french: Restaurez la cape magique d'Areelu.
description.italian: Ripristina il mantello magico di Areelu.
description.spanish: Restaura la capa mágica de Areelu.
description.schinese: 取回阿瑞露的魔法斗篷。
description.russian: Восстановите волшебный плащ Арилу.
description.brazilian: Restaure o manto mágico de Areelu.

description.english: Dispel every single buff from a certain Runelord you'll meet.
description.german: Banne jeden Buff von einem gewissen Runenherrscher, dem du begegnen wirst.
description.french: Dissipez tous les bonus d'un certain Seigneur des Runes.
description.italian: Dissolvi tutti gli incantesimi di potenziamento di un certo Signore delle Rune che incontrerai.
description.spanish: Disipa todos los conjuros de refuerzo de cierto Señor de las Runas.
description.schinese: 解除你将来会遇到的一位秘符之主身上的所有增益状态。
description.russian: Рассейте все до одного защитные заклинания некоего рунного лорда, который вам встретится.
description.brazilian: Dissipe todos os benefícios de um certo Lorde Rúnico.

description.english: Complete the game with following settings, accomplishing the following deeds: 1) Core difficulty or above; 2) Party's speed depends on the weight you're carrying; 3) No auto level-up for PC or companions; 4) No retrain; 5) No more than 75 rests total; 6) Find and kill all optional bosses in the earliest chapter possible; 7) Defeat Khorramzadeh's army in Crusade mode; 8) Develop all four Crusade stats to their maximum potential; 9) Complete your mythic transformation.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel mit folgenden Einstellungen ab und vollbringe dabei folgende Taten: 1) Schwierigkeitsgrad "Basis" oder höher; 2) Geschwindigkeit der Gruppe hängt vom mitgeführten Gewicht ab; 3) Kein automatischer Stufenaufstieg für Spieler oder Gefährten; 4) Keine Umschulung; 5) Insgesamt höchstens 75 Ruhepausen; 6) Finde und töte alle optionalen Bosse im frühestmöglichen Kapitel; 7) Besiege Khorramzadehs Armee im Kreuzzugmodus; 8) Bringe alle vier Kreuzzugswerte auf ihr maximales Potenzial; 9) Schließe deine Legendenverwandlung ab.
description.french: Terminez une partie avec les conditions suivantes : 1) Mode Principal au moins ; 2) La vitesse du groupe dépend du poids transporté ; 3) Pas de progression de niveau automatique pour le joueur ou ses compagnons ; 4) Pas de respécialisation ; 5) 75 repos au max ; 6) Trouver et tuer les boss optionnels dès que possible ; 7) Vaincre l'ost de Khorramzadeh en mode Croisade ; 8) Passer les 4 statistiques de la croisade au maximum ; 9) Finir la transformation mythique.
description.italian: Completa il gioco con le seguenti impostazioni e compiendo le seguenti azioni: 1) Difficoltà Sfida o superiore; 2) La velocità del gruppo dipende dal peso che stai trasportando; 3) Nessun aumento di livello automatico, nemmeno per i compagni; 4) Nessun reset di classe; 5) Non più di 75 riposi totali; 6) Trova e uccidi tutti i boss opzionali nel primo capitolo; 7) Sconfiggi l'esercito di Khorramzadeh in modalità Crociata; 8) Sviluppa tutte e quattro le statistiche della Crociata al loro massimo potenziale; 9) Completa la tua trasformazione mitica.
description.spanish: Completa el juego con los siguientes ajustes y cumpliendo estos requisitos: 1) Dificultad normal o superior; 2) La velocidad del grupo depende del peso que lleva; 3) Sin subidas de nivel automáticas para los PJ ni los compañeros; 4) Sin reciclar; 5) No más de 75 descansos en total; 6) Encuentra y mata a todos los jefes opcionales en el primer capítulo en el que estén disponibles; 7) Derrota al ejército de Khorramzadeh en el modo Cruzada; 8) Desarrolla las cuatro características de la Cruzada al máximo; 9) Completa tu transformación mítica.
description.schinese: 以如下设置完成游戏，并完成下列事迹。1）核心或更高难度；2）队伍速度受负重影响；3）PC或同伴不使用自动升级；4）不使用重训；5）休息时间总共不超过75次；6）在尽可能早的章节中找到并杀死所有可选BOSS；7）在圣教军模式中击败霍乱扎德的军队；8）将全部四项圣教军属性发展到最高；9）完成你的神话转变。
description.russian: Пройдите игру со следующими настройками, совершив следующие действия: 1) Сложность - Суровая или выше; 2) Скорость отряда зависит от переносимого веса; 3) Не использовать автоматическое развитие для персонажа игрока или компаньонов; 4) Не использовать переобучение; 5) Не более 75 отдыхов за все прохождение; 6) Найдите и убейте всех опциональных боссов в самой ранней главе когда это возможно; 7) Победите армию Коррамзадеха в режиме битвы армий; 8) Поднимите все четыре статистики Крестового похода на максимум; 9) Завершите мифическое преображение.
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo atendendo a todas as seguintes condições: 1) Dificuldade Principal ou superior; 2) A velocidade do grupo depende do peso carregado; 3) O recurso de nivelamento automático do personagem ou companheiros não deve ser usado; 4) Não use o retreinamento; 5) Não tenha mais que 75 descansos; 6) Encontre e derrote todos os chefes opcionais assim que estiverem acessíveis; 7) Derrote o exército de Khorramzadeh no modo Cruzada; 8) Desenvolva ao máximo todas as quatro estatísticas da Cruzada; 9) Conclua sua transformação mítica.

description.english: Reclaim Drezen in Chapter 2 quickly and efficiently, and get praise from Queen Galfrey.
description.german: Erobere Drezen in Kapitel 2 rasch und effizient zurück, und erhalte dafür Lob von Königin Galfrey.
description.french: Au cours du chapitre 2, reconquérez Drézen rapidement et efficacement, et recevez les félicitations de la reine Galfrey.
description.italian: Nel capitolo 2, riconquista Drézen in modo rapido ed efficace, ricevendo gli elogi di Galfrey.
description.spanish: Recupera Drezen en el capítulo 2 con rapidez y eficacia y recibe los halagos de la reina Galfrey.
description.schinese: 在第2章快速而有效地收复眷泽城，并获得高芙瑞女王的赞赏。
description.russian: Отвоюйте Дрезен в главе 2 быстро и эффективно, удостоившись похвалы от королевы Голфри.
description.brazilian: Recupere Drezen no Capítulo 2 com rapidez e eficácia, e receba elogios da Rainha Galfrey.

description.english: Raise all four Crusade stats (Leadership, Strategy, Diplomacy, Military) to rank 5 in Chapter 3.
description.german: Steigere alle vier Kreuzzugswerte (Führerschaft, Strategie, Diplomatie, Militär) in Kapitel 3 auf Rang 5.
description.french: Au cours du chapitre 3, améliorez toutes les statistiques de la Croisade (Commandement, Stratégie, Diplomatie, Militaire) au rang 5.
description.italian: Nel capitolo 3, potenzia tutte le stats della Crociata (Com., Log., Diplo., Milit.) al Grado 5.
description.spanish: Sube las cuatro características de la Cruzada (Liderazgo, Estrategia, Diplomacia, Militar) al rango 5 en el capítulo 3.
description.schinese: 在第3章将四项圣教军属性（领导、策略、外交、军事）都提升到5级。
description.russian: Поднимите все статистики Крестового похода (Лидерство, Стратегия, Дипломатия, Армия) до 5 ранга в главе 3.
description.brazilian: Eleve as quatro estatísticas da Cruzada ao nível 5 durante o Capítulo 3.

description.english: Develop all Crusade stats to Rank 5 by the end of Act 3; and to maximum by the end of the game.
description.german: Bringe alle Kreuzzugswerte bis zum Ende von Akt 3 auf Rang 5 und bis Spielende auf Maximum.
description.french: Améliorez les statistiques de la Croisade au rang 5 avant le chapitre 4 et au max à la fin du jeu.
description.italian: Migliora tutte le statistiche della Crociata al massimo prima della fine del gioco.
description.spanish: Desarrolla los atributos de la Cruzada a rango 5 al final del acto 3 y al máximo al final del juego.
description.schinese: 在第3章结束时，将全部圣教军属性发展到5级。并且在游戏结束时全部发展到最高。
description.russian: К концу 3 акта поднимите все статистики Крестового похода до 5 ранга, а к концу игры — до максимума.
description.brazilian: Desenvolva as quatro estatísticas da Cruzada ao máximo antes de concluir o jogo.

description.english: Defeat Khorramzadeh's army in Crusade mode.
description.german: Besiege Khorramzadehs Armee im Kreuzzugmodus.
description.french: Terrassez l'armée de Khorramzadeh en mode Croisade.
description.italian: Sconfiggi l'esercito di Khorramzadeh in modalità Crociata.
description.spanish: Derrota al ejército de Khorramzadeh en modo Cruzada.
description.schinese: 在圣教军模式中击败霍乱扎德的军队。
description.russian: Победите армию Коррамзадеха в режиме битвы армий.
description.brazilian: Derrote o exército de Khorramzadeh no modo Cruzada.

description.english: Make a demon attack another demon in Crusade battle mode.
description.german: Bringe im Kreuzzug-Kampfmodus einen Dämon dazu, dass er einen anderen Dämon angreift.
description.french: Poussez un démon à attaquer un autre démon en mode Croisade.
description.italian: Fate in modo che un demone attacchi un altro demone nella modalità di battaglia della Crociata.
description.spanish: Haz que un demonio ataque a otro en el modo de batalla de la Cruzada.
description.schinese: 在圣教军战斗模式中，让一个恶魔攻击另一个恶魔。
description.russian: Заставьте одного демона атаковать другого демона в режиме битвы армий.
description.brazilian: Faça um demônio atacar outro demônio no modo de batalha da Cruzada.

description.english: Recruit the most powerful otherworldly creatures to your Crusade armies.
description.german: Rekrutiere die mächtigsten außerweltlichen Kreaturen für deine Kreuzfahrerarmeen.
description.french: Recrutez les créatures surnaturelles les plus puissantes dans votre armée de croisés.
description.italian: Recluta le più potenti creature extraplanari nel tuo esercito per la Crociata.
description.spanish: Recluta en tu ejército cruzado a las criaturas extraplanarias más poderosas.
description.schinese: 为你的圣教军招募最强大的异界生物。
description.russian: Привлеките могущественных созданий с иных планов для службы в ваших армиях.
description.brazilian: Recrute as mais poderosas criaturas extraplanares para o seu exército da Cruzada.

description.english: Defend the tavern from attack without losing a single building to the arsonists.
description.german: Verteidige die Taverne gegen Angriffe, ohne ein einziges Gebäude an die Brandstifter zu verlieren.
description.french: Défendez la taverne sans laisser le moindre pyromane détruire de bâtiment.
description.italian: Difendi la taverna dagli attacchi senza perdere nemmeno un edificio a causa dei piromani.
description.spanish: Defiende la taberna del ataque sin perder ni un solo edificio ante los pirómanos.
description.schinese: 保卫酒馆时避免任何建筑被纵火者摧毁。
description.russian: Защитите таверну от атаки, не дав поджигателям уничтожить ни одного здания.
description.brazilian: Defenda a taberna do ataque sem perder nenhum edifício para os incendiários.

displayName.russian: О капитуляции не может идти речи

description.english: Defeat Xanthir Vang. Then provoke him. Then defeat him again.
description.german: Besiege Xanthir Vang. Dann provoziere ihn. Und dann besiege ihn erneut.
description.french: Terrassez Xanthir Vang. Puis provoquez-le. Puis terrassez-le à nouveau.
description.italian: Sconfiggere Xanthir Vang. Provocalo. Sconfiggilo di nuovo.
description.spanish: Derrota a Xanthir Vang, provócale y vuelve a derrotarle.
description.schinese: 击败贤希尔·王之后，挑衅他并再次击败他。
description.russian: Победите Зантира Ванга. Затем спровоцируйте его. Затем - победите снова.
description.brazilian: Derrote Xanthir Vang. Em seguida, provoque-o. Depois, derrote-o novamente.

description.english: Investigate and prevent the demodand conspiracy in the Midnight City.
description.german: Untersuche und verhindere die Demodanden-Verschwörung in der Mitternachtsstadt.
description.french: Enquêtez sur le complot des démodandes et empêchez-les de mettre leur plan à exécution dans la Ville de Minuit.
description.italian: Indaga e previeni la cospirazione Demodand nella Città di Mezzanotte.
description.spanish: Investiga y pon fin al complot demodand en la ciudad de la Medianoche.
description.schinese: 调查并阻止午夜之城的魔孽阴谋。
description.russian: Расследуйте и предотвратите заговор демодандов в Полуночном городе.
description.brazilian: Investigue e impeça a conspiração dos demodands na Cidade da Meia-Noite.

description.english: Uncover the truth behind the mysterious ancient ruins and the ghosts that guard them.
description.german: Enthülle die Wahrheit der geheimnisvollen alten Ruinen und der Geister, die sie bewachen.
description.french: Découvrez la vérité sur les mystérieuses ruines antiques et les fantômes qui les gardent.
description.italian: Scopri la verità dietro le misteriose rovine antiche e i fantasmi che le custodiscono.
description.spanish: Descubre la verdad tras las misteriosas ruinas ancestrales y los fantasmas que las custodian.
description.schinese: 揭示神秘古代废墟及守卫该处的鬼魂背后的真相。
description.russian: Узнайте правду о загадочных древних святынях и духах, что их охраняют.
description.brazilian: Descubra a verdade por trás das misteriosas ruínas antigas e dos fantasmas que as guardam.

displayName.french: Un ennemi digne de ce nom

description.english: Playing on Core difficulty or above, defeat the water elemental in the Prologue.
description.german: Spiele im Schwierigkeitsgrad "Basis" oder höher, und besiege das Wasserelementar im Prolog.
description.french: En mode Principal ou plus difficile encore, au cours du prologue, terrassez l'élémentaire d'eau.
description.italian: Giocando a difficoltà Sfida o superiore, trova e sconfiggi l'Elementale dell'Acqua nel Prologo.
description.spanish: En dificultad Normal o superior, derrota al elemental de agua del prólogo.
description.schinese: 以核心或更高难度，击败序章的水元素。
description.russian: Играя на Суровой сложности или выше, победите Водного элементаля в Прологе.
description.brazilian: Na dificuldade Principal ou superior, derrote o elemental de água no Prólogo.

description.english: Playing on Core difficulty or above, find the nabasu demon on the streets of Kenabres and kill him.
description.german: Spiele im Schwierigkeitsgrad "Basis" oder höher, finde den Nabasu-Dämon auf den Straßen von Kenabres und töte ihn.
description.french: En mode Principal ou plus difficile encore, trouvez le nabasu dans les rues de Kénabres et éliminez-le.
description.italian: Giocando a difficoltà Sfida o superiore, trova il demone Nabasu nelle strade di Kenabres e uccidilo.
description.spanish: En dificultad Normal o superior, encuentra al demonio nabasu en las calles de Kenabres y mátalo.
description.schinese: 以核心或更高难度，在坎娜布利街道上找到并击败食魂魔。
description.russian: Играя на Суровой сложности или выше, обнаружьте набасу на улицах Кенабреса и убейте его.
description.brazilian: Na dificuldade Principal ou superior, encontre e derrote o demônio nabasu nas ruas de Kenabres.

description.english: Playing on Core difficulty or above, allow Chorussina to summon a powerful demon in Drezen and defeat him.
description.german: Spiele im Schwierigkeitsgrad "Basis" oder höher, erlaube Chorussina, einen mächtigen Dämon in Drezen zu beschwören, und besiege ihn.
description.french: En mode Principal ou plus difficile encore, permettez à Chorussine d'invoquer un puissant démon dans Drézen et terrassez la bête.
description.italian: Giocando a difficoltà Sfida o superiore, uccidi il demone evocato a Drezen da Chorussina.
description.spanish: En dificultad normal o superior, deja que Chorussina invoque un demonio poderoso en Drezen y derrótalo.
description.schinese: 以核心或更高难度，允许眷泽城的丘璐希娜召唤出强大的恶魔并将其击败。
description.russian: Играя на Суровой сложности или выше, позвольте Коруссине призвать могучего демона в Дрезене и победите его.
description.brazilian: Na dificuldade Principal ou superior, derrote o demônio poderoso invocado por Chorussina em Drezen.

displayName.french: La fin de la servitude éternelle

description.english: Playing on Core difficulty or above, find and defeat the final Eternal Guardian of the Ivory Sanctum.
description.german: Spiele im Schwierigkeitsgrad "Basis" oder höher, finde und besiege den letzten Ewigen Wächter der Elfenbeinzuflucht.
description.french: En mode Principal ou plus difficile encore, trouvez et terrassez le dernier gardien éternel du Sanctuaire d'ivoire.
description.italian: Giocando a difficoltà Sfida o superiore, sconfiggi l'ultimo Guardiano Eterno del Sacrario d'Avorio.
description.spanish: En dificultad normal o superior, encuentra y derrota al guardián eterno del Santuario de Marfil.
description.schinese: 以核心或更高难度，在象牙迷堂找到并击败永恒守卫。
description.russian: Играя на Суровой сложности или выше, найдите и сразите последнего Вечного стража в Костяной ложе.
description.brazilian: Na dificuldade Principal ou superior, derrote o último Guardião Eterno do Santuário de Marfim.

description.english: Playing on Core difficulty or above, kill the Playful Darkness in the Midnight Fane.
description.german: Spiele im Schwierigkeitsgrad "Basis" oder höher, und töte die Verspielte Dunkelheit im Mitternachtstempel.
description.french: En mode Principal ou plus difficile encore, éliminez les ténèbres espiègles dans le Temple de Minuit.
description.italian: Giocando a difficoltà Sfida o superiore, sconfiggi l'Oscurità Maliziosa nell'Atrio di Mezzanotte.
description.spanish: En dificultad normal o superior, mata a la oscuridad juguetona del Atrio de la Medianoche.
description.schinese: 以核心或更高难度，在午夜庙宇杀死取乐的黑暗。
description.russian: Играя на Суровой сложности или выше, убейте Игривую тьму в Полуночном капище.
description.brazilian: Na dificuldade Principal ou superior, mate a Escuridão Travessa no Átrio da Meia-Noite.

description.english: Playing on Core difficulty or above, find and defeat the Pathetic Quasit in Alushinyrra.
description.german: Spiele im Schwierigkeitsgrad "Basis" oder höher, finde und besiege den Jämmerlichen Quasit in Aluschinyrra.
description.french: En mode Principal ou plus difficile encore, trouvez et terrassez le quasit pathétique à Alushinyrra.
description.italian: Giocando a difficoltà Sfida o superiore, trova e sconfiggi il Quasit Patetico ad Alushinyrra.
description.spanish: En dificultad normal o superior, encuentra y derrota al quásit patético de Alushinyrra.
description.schinese: 以核心或更高难度，在阿勒什尼拉找到并击败卑微的怪似魔。
description.russian: Играя на Суровой сложности или выше, найдите и победите Жалкого квазита в Алушинирре.
description.brazilian: Na dificuldade Principal ou superior, encontre e derrote o Quasit Patético em Alushinyrra.

description.english: Playing on Core difficulty or above, kill Melazmera, the umbral dragon of Colyphyr.
description.german: Spiele im Schwierigkeitsgrad "Basis" oder höher, und töte Melazmera, den Zwielichtdrachen von Colyphyr.
description.french: En mode Principal ou plus difficile encore, éliminez Mélazmère, le dragon umbral de Colyphyr.
description.italian: Giocando a difficoltà Sfida o superiore, sconfiggi Melazmera, il Drago delle Ombre di Colyphyr.
description.spanish: En dificultad normal o superior, mata a Melazmera, el dragón sombrío de Colifir.
description.schinese: 以核心或更高难度，杀死苛隶斐尔的影龙米勒兹梅拉。
description.russian: Играя на Суровой сложности или выше, убейте Мелазмеру, теневого дракона Колифира.
description.brazilian: Na dificuldade Principal ou superior, mate Melazmera, o dragão das sombras de Colyphyr.

description.english: Playing on Core difficulty or above, find and defeat the Ashen Lady in the Ivory Labyrinth.
description.german: Spiele im Schwierigkeitsgrad "Basis" oder höher, finde und besiege die Aschedame im Elfenbein-Labyrinth.
description.french: En mode Principal ou plus difficile encore, trouvez et terrassez la Dame des Cendres dans le Labyrinthe d'ivoire.
description.italian: Giocando a difficoltà Sfida o superiore, sconfiggi la Signora Cinerea nel Labirinto d'Avorio.
description.spanish: En dificultad normal o superior, encuentra y derrota a la Señora de la Ceniza del Laberinto de Marfil.
description.schinese: 以核心或更高难度，在象牙迷宫找到并击败苍白女士。
description.russian: Играя на Суровой сложности или выше, найдите и победите Пепельную леди в Костяном лабиринте.
description.brazilian: Na dificuldade Principal ou superior, encontre e derrote a Dama Cinzenta no Labirinto de Marfim.

description.english: Experience two mysterious visions before meeting the person behind them while storming Drezen.
description.german: Erlebe zwei geheimnisvolle Visionen, bevor du die dafür verantwortliche Person triffst, während du Drezen stürmst.
description.french: Soyez témoin de deux étranges visions avant de rencontrer la personne qui en est responsable au cours de l'assaut sur Drézen.
description.italian: Assisti a due visioni misteriose prima di scoprirne la fonte mentre assediate Drezen.
description.spanish: Experimenta dos misteriosas visiones antes de encontrar su origen mientras asedias Drezen.
description.schinese: 体验两段神秘幻视，然后在强攻眷泽城期间遇到其幕后之人。
description.russian: Узрите два загадочных видения прежде чем встретиться с персоной, посылающей их, во время штурма Дрезена.
description.brazilian: Experiencie as duas visões misteriosas antes de encontrar sua origem durante o assalto a Drezen.

description.english: Unlock all six mythic paths before choosing one at the end of Chapter 2.
description.german: Schalte alle sechs Legendenwege frei, bevor du dich am Ende von Kapitel 2 für einen entscheidest.
description.french: Débloquez les six voies mythiques avant de faire votre choix à la fin du chapitre 2.
description.italian: Sblocca tutti e sei i percorsi mitici prima di sceglierne uno alla fine del Capitolo 2.
description.spanish: Desbloquea las seis sendas míticas antes de elegir una al final del capítulo 2.
description.schinese: 在第2章结尾选择神话道途之前，解锁全部六条道途。
description.russian: Откройте все шесть мифических путей прежде чем выбрать один их них в конце второй главы.
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todos os seis caminhos míticos antes de escolher um ao final do Capítulo 2.

description.english: Find all of Areelu's crystals containing records and watch the contents.
description.german: Finde alle Kristalle von Areelu mit Aufzeichnungen, und sieh dir ihre Inhalte an.
description.french: Trouvez tous les cristaux d'Areelu et regardez-en le contenu.
description.italian: Trova tutti i cristalli di Areelu che contengono i loro registri e osservane il contenuto.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los cristales de Areelu que contienen sus registros y observa su contenido.
description.schinese: 找到阿瑞露所有含有记录的水晶，并观看其中的内容。
description.russian: Найдите все кристаллы Арилу и посмотрите записи с них.
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os cristais de Areelu que contêm os registros e veja seu conteúdo.

description.english: It seems one of your companions is attracted to you. Where will it lead?
description.german: Anscheinend fühlt sich jemand aus deiner Gefährtenschaft zu dir hingezogen. Wohin wird das führen?
description.french: L'un de vos compagnons semble s'être entiché de vous. Où cela va-t-il bien pouvoir vous mener ?
description.italian: Sembra che qualcuno dei tuoi companion provi qualcosa per te. Come finirà questa storia?
description.spanish: Parece que alguien de tu grupo siente algo por ti. ¿Cómo acabará esa historia?
description.schinese: 似乎你的一个同伴对你动了心，这会带来怎样的后话呢？
description.russian: Кажется, вы приглянулись кому-то из ваших спутников. Приведет ли это к чему-либо?
description.brazilian: Parece que alguém do seu grupo está atraído por você. Como essa história terminará?

description.english: You found love in the midst of the war with the Abyss.
description.german: Du hast mitten im Krieg gegen den Abyss die Liebe gefunden.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé l'amour alors même que la guerre contre les Abysses faisait rage.
description.italian: Hai trovato l'amore nel mezzo della guerra contro l'Abisso.
description.spanish: Has encontrado el amor en la guerra contra el Abismo.
description.schinese: 在与深渊的战争期间，你收获了爱情。
description.russian: Вы обрели любовь в разгар войны с Бездной.
description.brazilian: Você encontrou o amor em meio à guerra contra o Abismo.

description.english: Save or release the cultist scribe in the Tower of Estrod, the poor traveler attacked by vescavors, and the vrock in the Molten Scar. Then find out what happened to them later...
description.german: Entscheide über Rettung oder Freilassung des Kultisten-Schreibers in Estrods Turm, des armen Reisenden, den die Vescavoren angegriffen haben, und des Vrock in der Geschmolzenen Narbe. Finde später heraus, was ihnen im Anschluss widerfahren ist ...
description.french: Sauvez ou libérez le scribe fanatique de la tour d'Estrode, le pauvre voyageur attaqué par les vescavores et la vrock de la Balafre embrasée. Puis, plus tard, découvrez ce qui leur est arrivé...
description.italian: Salva o libera lo scriba cultista nella Torre di Estrod, il povero viaggiatore attaccato dai vescavor e il Vrock nella Cicatrice Fusa. Poi scopri cosa gli è successo in seguito...
description.spanish: Salva o libera al escriba sectario de la Torre de Estrod, al pobre viajero al que atacan los vescavors y al vrock de la Cicatriz Fundida. Después descubre qué fue de ellos...
description.schinese: 拯救或释放伊斯绰德塔的邪教书吏、被饕餮虫袭击的可怜旅人、以及熔火之痕的妄乱魔。然后了解他们后来的遭遇……
description.russian: Спасите или отпустите культиста-писаря в Башне Эстрод, несчастного путешественника, атакованного вескаворами, и вроку в Дымящемся шраме. Затем разузнайте, что произойдет с ними после...
description.brazilian: Salve ou liberte o escriba cultista na Torre de Estrod, o pobre viajante atacado pelos vescavors e o vrock na Cicatriz Derretida. Depois, descubra o que aconteceu com eles...

displayName.brazilian: Entre o Divino e o Demoníaco

description.english: Face two great entities and make your choice.
description.german: Stelle dich zwei großen Wesenheiten und triff deine Entscheidung.
description.french: Faites face à deux puissantes entités et faites votre choix.
description.italian: Affronta due potenti entità e fà una scelta.
description.spanish: Habla con dos existencias poderosas y toma una decisión.
description.schinese: 在两大伟力面前做出你的选择。
description.russian: Перед ликом двух могущественных сущностей совершите выбор.
description.brazilian: Enfrente duas grandes entidades e faça sua escolha.

description.english: Save the cart of booze during the Defender's Heart battle and all the courtesans at Daeran's party mansion.
description.german: Rette während der Schlacht um das Hüterherz den Karren mit Alkohol sowie sämtliche Kurtisanen in Daerans Lustbarkeitsanwesen.
description.french: Sauvez le chariot d'alcool lors de la bataille du Cœur du défenseur et tous les invités de la fête au manoir de Daeran.
description.italian: Salva il carretto degli alcolici durante la battaglia a Cuore del difensore e tutte le cortigiane nella villa delle feste di Daeran.
description.spanish: Salva el carro de la cerveza durante la batalla del Corazón del Defensor y a todos los cortesanos de la fiesta de la mansión de Daeran.
description.schinese: 拯救铁卫雄心保卫战中的运酒车，以及岱兰派对大宅中的所有交际花和牛郎。
description.russian: Спасите тележку с выпивкой в ходе атаки на Сердце защитника, а также всех куртизанок и эскорт.
description.brazilian: Salve a carroça de bebidas durante a batalha do Coração do Defensor e todos os cortesãos na festa da mansão de Daeran.

description.english: Become the champion of the one true queen... the Fulsome Queen.
description.german: Werde der Streiter der einzig wahren Königin ... der Widerlichen Königin.
description.french: Prenez fait et cause pour la seule et unique souveraine légitime... la Reine obséquieuse.
description.italian: Diventa il campione dell'unica vera regina... la Regina Lussuriosa.
description.spanish: Conviértete en la mano derecha de la auténtica reina... la Reina Inmunda.
description.schinese: 成为唯一名正言顺的女王……谄媚女王的斗士。
description.russian: Станьте рыцарем единственной подлинной царицы... Гнусной царицы.
description.brazilian: Torne-se o braço direito da verdadeira rainha... a Rainha Pretensiosa.

description.english: Hit your own party with the rolling column in the Tower of Estrod.
description.german: Triff deine eigene Gruppe mit der rollenden Säule in Estrods Turm.
description.french: Provoquez l'effondrement de la colonne de la tour d'Estrode sur votre propre groupe.
description.italian: Colpisci il tuo gruppo con la colonna della Torre di Estrod.
description.spanish: Golpea a tu propio grupo con la columna de la Torre de Estrod.
description.schinese: 用伊斯绰德塔里滚动的柱子击中自己的队伍。
description.russian: Обрушьте на собственный отряд мощь и тяжесть колонны в Башне Эстрод.
description.brazilian: Acerte seu próprio grupo com a coluna da Torre de Estrod.

displayName.spanish: Obra de la Puerta de Al Lado
displayName.brazilian: Peça Teatral do Porta ao Lado

description.english: Find the Next-Door Theater in each chapter of the game and help the troupe to finally stage their play.
description.german: Finde in jedem Kapitel des Spiels das Theater in der Nachbarschaft, und hilf der Truppe, am Ende ihr Stück aufzuführen.
description.french: Trouvez le Théâtre d'à côté dans tous les chapitres et aidez la troupe à présenter sa pièce.
description.italian: Trova il Teatro della Porta Accanto in tutti i capitoli e aiutali a mettere in scena la loro opera.
description.spanish: Encuentra al Teatro de la Puerta de Al Lado en todos los capítulos del juego y ayuda a la compañía a representar su obra.
description.schinese: 在游戏的每个章节中找到邻家剧团，并帮助剧团最终演出他们的戏剧。
description.russian: Найдите Театр-во-дворе в каждой главе игры и помогите труппе наконец-то поставить пьесу.
description.brazilian: Encontre o Teatro do Porta ao Lado em cada capítulo do jogo e ajude a trupe a encenar sua peça.

description.english: No time to explain. Just get the toad!
description.german: Keine Zeit für Erklärungen. Hol dir einfach die Kröte!
description.french: Pas de temps à perdre en explication. Attrapez ce crapaud !
description.italian: Non c'è tempo per le spiegazioni. Prendi il rospo!
description.spanish: No hay tiempo para explicaciones, ¡coge al sapo!
description.schinese: 没时间解释了，快抓蟾蜍！
description.russian: Некогда объяснять. Просто берите жабу!
description.brazilian: Sem tempo para explicações. Só pegue o sapo!

description.english: You chose Hell.
description.german: Du hast die Hölle gewählt.
description.french: Vous avez choisi l'Enfer.
description.italian: Hai scelto l'Inferno.
description.spanish: Has elegido el Infierno.
description.schinese: 你选择了地狱。
description.russian: Вы выбрали Ад.
description.brazilian: Você escolheu o Inferno.

description.english: You chose the right weapon to fight a demon lord.
description.german: Du hast die richtige Waffe für den Kampf gegen einen Dämonenherrscher gewählt.
description.french: Vous avez choisi l'arme adaptée pour affronter un seigneur démon.
description.italian: Hai scelto un'arma appropriata per affrontare un signore dei demoni.
description.spanish: Has elegido un arma apropiada para enfrentarte a un señor demoníaco.
description.schinese: 你选择了正确的武器来对付恶魔领主。
description.russian: Вы выбрали верное оружие для битвы с лордом демонов.
description.brazilian: Você escolheu a arma certa para lutar contra um lorde demônio.

description.english: You managed to spark doubt in Areelu's dark heart and made her care for you.
description.german: Es ist dir gelungen, Zweifel in Areelus finsterem Herz zu säen und dafür zu sorgen, dass ihr an dir liegt.
description.french: Vous avez instillé le doute dans le cœur noir d'Areelu et éveillé ses sentiments pour vous.
description.italian: Sei riuscito a far scattare il dubbio nel cuore oscuro di Areelu e a far sì che si prendesse cura di te.
description.spanish: Has conseguido despertar dudas en el corazón negro de Areelu y has hecho que se preocupe por ti.
description.schinese: 你成功地在阿瑞露黑暗的心中引发了怀疑，使她关心你。
description.russian: Вы смогли породить искру сомнения в темном сердце Арилу и стали дороги ей.
description.brazilian: Você conseguiu despertar dúvidas no coração sombrio de Areelu e fez com que ela se preocupasse com você.

description.english: Against all odds, through trials unthinkable, you ascended as a true demigod.
description.german: Du hast die mächtige und weise Gesichtslose Sphinx überzeugt, dass sie im Wind der Zeit nicht mehr ist als ein einzelnes Sandkorn.
description.french: Envers et contre tout, après avoir traversé bon nombre d'épreuves pourtant insurmontables, vous avez réussi votre élévation au rang de demi-dieu.
description.italian: Contro ogni previsione, superando prove inimmaginabili, sei asceso come un vero semidio.
description.spanish: Contra todo pronóstico, después de superar retos inimaginables, has ascendido para convertirte en una auténtica semideidad.
description.schinese: 你排除万难，通过了不可思议的考验，飞升成一位真正的半神。
description.russian: Вопреки всему, вы вознеслись и стали настоящим полубожеством.
description.brazilian: Contra todas as probabilidades e desafios inimagináveis, você se tornou um verdadeiro semideus.

description.english: You persuaded the mighty and wise Faceless Sphinx that she is nothing, just a grain of sand in the winds of time.
description.german: Du hast die mächtige und weise Gesichtslose Sphinx überzeugt, dass sie im Wind der Zeit nicht mehr ist als ein einzelnes Sandkorn.
description.french: Vous avez persuadé le Sphinx sans Visage, créature sage et puissante, qu'elle n'était rien de plus qu'un grain de sable balayé par les vents du temps.
description.italian: Hai convinto la potente e saggia Sfinge senza Volto che lei non è nulla, solo un granello di sabbia nel vento del tempo.
description.spanish: Has convencido a la poderosa y sabia Esfinge sin Rostro de que no es nada; un grano de arena en los vientos del tiempo.
description.schinese: 你说服强大而聪慧的无面人身狮，让她认为自己什么都不是，只是时间之风中的一粒沙。
description.russian: Вы смогли убедить могучего Безликого сфинкса, что она - ничто, песчинка на ветрах времени.
description.brazilian: Você convenceu a poderosa e sábia Esfinge Sem Rosto de que ela não é nada, apenas um grão de areia nos ventos do tempo.

description.english: You helped the Storyteller to regain his lost memories — and reunited him with one who was dear to him.
description.german: Du hast dem Geschichtenerzähler geholfen, seine verlorenen Erinnerungen zurückzuerlangen – und ihn mit jemandem wiedervereint, an dem ihm sehr lag.
description.french: Vous avez aidé le Conteur à recouvrer la mémoire et l'avez réuni avec un être cher à son cœur.
description.italian: Hai aiutato il Narratore a recuperare i suoi ricordi perduti e lo hai ricongiunto a qualcuno che gli era piuttosto caro.
description.spanish: Has ayudado al Narrador a recuperar sus recuerdos perdidos y le has reunido con alguien importante para él.
description.schinese: 你帮助说书人恢复了失去的记忆，并让他与一个对他来说很重要的人重逢。
description.russian: Вы помогли Сказителю обрести утраченные воспоминания - и воссоединиться с тем, кто был ему дорог.
description.brazilian: Você ajudou o Cronista a recuperar suas memórias perdidas — e o reuniu com alguém importante para ele.

description.english: You found the secret sanctum in the Midnight Fane.
description.german: Du hast das geheime Heiligtum im Mitternachtstempel gefunden.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé le sanctuaire secret du Temple de Minuit.
description.italian: Hai trovato il santuario segreto nel Tempio della Mezzanotte.
description.spanish: Has encontrado el santuario secreto en el Atrio de la Medianoche.
description.schinese: 你在午夜庙宇发现了秘密圣所。
description.russian: Вы разыскали тайное святилище в недрах Полуночного капища.
description.brazilian: Você encontrou o santuário secreto no Átrio da Meia-Noite.

description.english: One of the crusade's greatest weapons is now in your hands.
description.german: Eine der stärksten Waffen des Kreuzzugs ist nun in deiner Hand.
description.french: Vous avez obtenu l'une des armes les plus puissantes de la croisade.
description.italian: Una delle più potenti armi della crociata è ora nelle tue mani.
description.spanish: Te has hecho con una de las mayores armas de la Cruzada.
description.schinese: 圣教军最伟大的武器之一现在由你掌握。
description.russian: Один из величайших клинков крестоносцев теперь в ваших руках.
description.brazilian: Uma das maiores armas da cruzada agora está em suas mãos.

description.english: You investigated and uncovered a saboteur in your army.
description.german: Du hast gegen einen Saboteur in deiner Armee ermittelt und ihn enttarnt.
description.french: Vous avez démasqué un saboteur dans votre armée.
description.italian: Dopo aver indagato hai scoperto un sabotatore nel tuo esercito.
description.spanish: Has investigado y descubierto a un saboteador en tu ejército.
description.schinese: 你通过调查发现了你的军队中的一个奸细。
description.russian: Вы провели расследование и раскрыли диверсанта в рядах вашей армии.
description.brazilian: Você investigou e descobriu um sabotador em seu exército.

description.english: Congratulations! You completed the Inevitable Excess DLC!
description.german: Glückwunsch! Du hast den DLC "Unvermeidbarer Exzess" abgeschlossen!
description.french: Félicitations ! Vous avez terminé le DLC Inevitable Excess !
description.italian: Congratulazioni! Hai completato il DLC Eccesso Inevitabile!
description.spanish: ¡Enhorabuena! ¡Has completado el DLC Exceso inevitable!
description.schinese: 祝贺！你完成了DLC《无解的超量》！
description.russian: Поздравляем! Вы закончили DLC "Неизбежные последствия"!
description.brazilian: Parabéns! Você completou o DLC Excedente Inevitável!

description.english: You discovered the truth behind the anomalies.
description.german: Du hast die Wahrheit hinter den Anomalien entdeckt.
description.french: Vous avez découvert la vérité derrière les anomalies.
description.italian: Hai scoperto la verità celata dietro le anomalie.
description.spanish: Has descubierto la verdad oculta de las anomalías.
description.schinese: 你发现了反常现象背后的真相。
description.russian: Вы узнали правду об аномалиях.
description.brazilian: Você descobriu a verdade oculta das anomalias.

description.english: You discovered all cases of abnormal behavior in Iz before facing the real threat.
description.german: Du hast alle ungewöhnlichen Verhaltensweisen in Iz entdeckt, ehe du dich der wahren Bedrohung gestellt hast.
description.french: Vous avez identifié tous les cas de comportement étrange à Iz avant d'affronter la véritable menace.
description.italian: Hai scoperto tutti i casi di comportamento anomalo a Iz prima di affrontare la vera minaccia.
description.spanish: Has descubierto todos los casos de comportamiento anómalo en Iz antes de enfrentarte a la amenaza real.
description.schinese: 在面对真正的威胁之前，你就在伊兹城发现了所有异常行为。
description.russian: Вы обнаружили все случаи странного поведения до того, как столкнулись с истинной угрозой.
description.brazilian: Você descobriu todos os casos de comportamento anormal em Iz antes de enfrentar a verdadeira ameaça.

description.english: You managed to talk your way out of the fight that seemed bound to happen.
description.german: Du hast dich aus dem scheinbar unvermeidlichen Kampf herausgeredet.
description.french: Votre éloquence vous a permis d'éviter un combat qui semblait inéluctable.
description.italian: Sei riuscito ad uscire da uno scontro che sembrava inevitabile.
description.spanish: Has logrado evitar un combate que parecía ineludible.
description.schinese: 你用口才平息了看似必定会发生的战斗。
description.russian: Вам удалось избежать боя, который должен был случиться.
description.brazilian: Você conseguiu evitar um combate que parecia inevitável com suas palavras.

description.english: You just had to check, didn't you?
description.german: Du musstest es einfach versuchen, oder?
description.french: Il a fallu que vous vérifiiez, n'est-ce pas ?
description.italian: Dovevi controllare, vero?
description.spanish: Tenías que mirar, ¿no?
description.schinese: 总得验一验，对吧？
description.russian: Вы просто обязаны были их все проверить.
description.brazilian: Você só tinha que verificar, não é?

description.english: You allied yourself with Areelu Vorlesh's excess mythic power and escaped Valmallos's prison with your consciousness intact.
description.german: Du hast Areelu Vorleshs überbordende Legendenkräfte genutzt und bist mit unversehrtem Verstand aus Valmallos Gefängnis entkommen.
description.french: Vous avez fait alliance avec l'excès de pouvoir mythique d'Areelu Vorlesh et échappé à la prison de Valmallos avec votre conscience intacte.
description.italian: Hai sfruttato il potere mitico di Areelu Vorlesh fuggendo dalla prigione di Valmallos con la coscienza intatta.
description.spanish: Te has aliado con el exceso de poder mítico de Areelu Vorlesh y has escapado de la prisión de Valmallos con tu consciencia intacta.
description.schinese: 你与阿瑞露·沃勒什的超量神话之力结盟，并且意识完好无损地逃离了瓦尔码络斯的监牢。
description.russian: Вы объединились с избытком мифических сил Арилу Ворлеш и покинули тюрьму Валмаллоса, сохранив собственное "я".
description.brazilian: Você se aliou a excedente do poder mítico de Areelu Vorlesh e escapou da prisão de Valmallos com sua consciência intacta.

description.english: You tricked someone else into killing the slimy colossus for you.
description.german: Du hast jemanden dazu gebracht, den schleimigen Koloss für dich zu töten.
description.french: Vous avez incité un tiers à tuer le colosse visqueux à votre place.
description.italian: Hai ingannato qualcun altro affinché uccidesse il colosso gelatinoso al posto tuo.
description.spanish: Has engañado a alguien para que matara al coloso viscoso por ti.
description.schinese: 巧妙利用他人替你杀死黏液巨像。
description.russian: Вы убили слизистого исполина чужими руками.
description.brazilian: Você enganou alguém para matar o colosso viscoso por você.

description.english: You thoroughly looted the graveyard.
description.german: Du hast den Friedhof gründlich geplündert.
description.french: Vous avez allègrement pillé le cimetière.
description.italian: Hai saccheggiato da cima a fondo il cimitero.
description.spanish: Has saqueado a fondo el cementerio.
description.schinese: 彻底洗劫墓地。
description.russian: Вы полностью разграбили кладбище.
description.brazilian: Você saqueou completamente o cemitério.

description.english: You passed through the graveyard without inhaling the noxious fumes.
description.german: Du hast den Friedhof passiert, ohne die giftigen Dämpfe einzuatmen.
description.french: Vous avez traversé le cimetière sans inhaler les vapeurs toxiques.
description.italian: Hai attraversato il cimitero senza inalare i fumi nocivi.
description.spanish: Has atravesado el cementerio sin inhalar los gases nocivos.
description.schinese: 在穿过墓地时没有吸入毒烟。
description.russian: Вы прошли через кладбище, не надышавшись ядом.
description.brazilian: Você atravessou o cemitério sem inalar os gases nocivos.

description.english: You saved a man's life only to let him die a little later.
description.german: Du hast einem Mann das Leben gerettet, nur, um ihn wenig später sterben zu lassen.
description.french: Vous avez sauvé la vie d'un homme avant de le condamner à une mort certaine.
description.italian: Hai salvato la vita di un uomo solo per lasciarlo morire un po' più tardi.
description.spanish: Has salvado la vida de un hombre solo para matarlo al poco tiempo.
description.schinese: 救下一个男人的命，但只稍稍暂缓了他的死期。
description.russian: Вы спасли кого-то лишь для того, чтобы вскоре дать ему умереть.
description.brazilian: Você salvou a vida de um homem, apenas para deixá-lo morrer pouco tempo depois.

description.english: You brought music into the dead's abode.
description.german: Du hast Musik in die Bleibe des Toten gebracht.
description.french: Vous avez permis à la musique de résonner dans le sanctuaire des défunts.
description.italian: Hai riportato la musica nella dimora dei morti.
description.spanish: Has traído la música a la morada de los muertos.
description.schinese: 将音乐带到了死者的居所。
description.russian: Вы принесли музыку в обитель мертвых.
description.brazilian: Você levou a música para a morada dos mortos.

description.english: A truly brave soul sacrificed himself for his friends.
description.german: Eine wahrhaft mutige Seele hat sich für ihre Freunde geopfert.
description.french: Une âme valeureuse s'est sacrifiée pour sauver ses amis.
description.italian: Un'anima davvero coraggiosa si è sacrificata per i suoi amici.
description.spanish: Un alma verdaderamente noble se ha sacrificado por sus amigos.
description.schinese: 一位真正勇敢的灵魂为了朋友选择自我牺牲。
description.russian: Настоящий храбрец принес себя в жертву ради друзей.
description.brazilian: Uma alma verdadeiramente corajosa se sacrificou pelos amigos.

description.english: True friends didn't let their brave comrade sacrifice himself.
description.german: Wahre Freunde haben nicht zugelassen, dass sich ihr mutiger Kamerad für sie opfert.
description.french: En amis fidèles, vous n'avez pas laissé votre brave camarade se sacrifier pour vous.
description.italian: I veri amici non hanno permesso al loro coraggioso compagno di sacrificarsi.
description.spanish: Los amigos de verdad no dejan que sus camaradas se sacrifiquen.
description.schinese: 真正的同伴不会让勇敢的战友自我牺牲。
description.russian: Настоящие друзья не позволили храбрецу пожертвовать собой.
description.brazilian: Os verdadeiros amigos não deixaram seu corajoso companheiro se sacrificar.

displayName.brazilian: Este Lado Voltado para o Inimigo

description.english: You forgot about safety precautions and paid the price.
description.german: Du hast vergessen, Sicherheitsvorkehrungen zu treffen, und den Preis dafür bezahlt.
description.french: Vous avez négligé les précautions d'usage et vous avez payé le prix de votre incurie.
description.italian: Hai dimenticato di prendere le giuste precauzioni e ne hai pagato il prezzo.
description.spanish: Has olvidado las precauciones de seguridad y pagado el precio.
description.schinese: 忘记了安全防范措施，并为此付出了代价。
description.russian: Вы забыли о технике безопасности, и поплатились.
description.brazilian: Você se esqueceu das precauções de segurança e pagou o preço.

description.english: You brought the group to safety without a single casualty.
description.german: Du hast die Gruppe ohne Verluste in Sicherheit gebracht.
description.french: Vous avez conduit le groupe en lieu sûr sans perdre qui que ce soit.
description.italian: Hai portato il gruppo in salvo senza una sola vittima.
description.spanish: Has traído al grupo a un lugar seguro sin sufrir bajas.
description.schinese: 将队伍带到安全场所，且无一人伤亡。
description.russian: Вы привели беглецов в безопасность без единой потери.
description.brazilian: Você levou o grupo para um local seguro sem sofrer nenhuma baixa.

description.english: You made it to the end with just three people in your party.
description.german: Du hast das Ende mit nur drei Leuten in deiner Gruppe erreicht.
description.french: Vous avez relevé tous les défis avec un groupe restreint de trois personnes seulement.
description.italian: Sei arrivato alla fine con solo tre membri nel tuo gruppo.
description.spanish: Has llegado al final con solo tres personas en tu grupo.
description.schinese: 仅凭队伍中的三人走到结局。
description.russian: Вы прошли до конца отрядом из трех человек.
description.brazilian: Você chegou ao final com apenas três pessoas em seu grupo.

description.english: You read every book and letter.
description.german: Du hast alle Bücher und Briefe gelesen.
description.french: Vous avez lu tous les livres et toutes les lettres.
description.italian: Hai letto ogni libro e lettera.
description.spanish: Has leído todos los libros y todas las cartas.
description.schinese: 阅读所有书籍和信件。
description.russian: Вы прочли все книги и письма.
description.brazilian: Você leu todos os livros e cartas.

description.english: You found every single underground mushroom.
description.german: Du hast alle unterirdischen Pilze gefunden.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé tous les champignons des souterrains.
description.italian: Hai trovato tutti i funghi nel sottosuolo.
description.spanish: Has encontrado todas las setas del subterráneo.
description.schinese: 发现每一种地底蘑菇。
description.russian: Вы нашли все подземные грибы.
description.brazilian: Você encontrou todos os cogumelos subterrâneos.

description.english: You made a criminal pay for his crimes.
description.german: Du hast einen Verbrecher für seine Taten bezahlen lassen.
description.french: Vous avez livré un criminel à la justice.
description.italian: Ti sei assicurato che un criminale pagasse per i suoi crimini.
description.spanish: Has hecho que un delincuente pague por sus actos.
description.schinese: 将一位罪犯绳之以法。
description.russian: Вы заставили преступника расплатиться за содеянное.
description.brazilian: Você fez um criminoso pagar pelos seus crimes.

description.english: You solved every puzzle.
description.german: Du hast alle Rätsel gelöst.
description.french: Vous avez résolu toutes les énigmes.
description.italian: Hai risolto ogni enigma.
description.spanish: Has resuelto todos los puzles.
description.schinese: 解开所有谜题。
description.russian: Вы решили все головоломки.
description.brazilian: Você resolveu todos os enigmas.

description.english: You knocked on every door in the rich quarter.
description.german: Du hast alle Türen im Reichenviertel eingetreten.
description.french: Vous avez frappé à toutes les portes du quartier riche.
description.italian: Hai bussato a tutte le porte del quartiere benestante.
description.spanish: Has llamado a todas las puertas del barrio rico.
description.schinese: 敲响富人区的每道门。
description.russian: Вы постучались во все двери богатого квартала.
description.brazilian: Você bateu em todas as portas do bairro rico.

displayName.french: Un éléphant dans un magasin de porcelaine

description.english: You toppled everything you could.
description.german: Du hast alles umgeworfen, was du konntest.
description.french: Vous avez renversé tout ce que vous pouviez.
description.italian: Hai rovesciato tutto quello che potevi.
description.spanish: Has derribado todo lo que se puede derribar.
description.schinese: 打翻所有能打翻的东西。
description.russian: Вы уронили все, что только можно было уронить.
description.brazilian: Você derrubou tudo o que pôde.

displayName.italian: Con la Pioggia o con il Sole
displayName.russian: И в снег, и в дождь

description.english: The report was delivered, despite minor difficulties along the way.
description.german: Der Bericht wurde trotz einiger unbedeutender Schwierigkeiten zugestellt.
description.french: Le rapport a été remis, malgré les difficultés mineures rencontrées en chemin.
description.italian: Il rapporto è stato consegnato, nonostante le piccole difficoltà incontrate lungo il percorso.
description.spanish: Has entregado el informe a pesar de los pequeños contratiempos.
description.schinese: 尽管遇到些小挫折，但报告还是交到了。
description.russian: Отчет был доставлен, несмотря на небольшие помехи по дороге.
description.brazilian: O relatório foi entregue, apesar de pequenas dificuldades ao longo do caminho.

description.english: The healer learned of her brethren's fate.
description.german: Die Heilerin hat aus dem Schicksal ihrer Brüder gelernt.
description.french: La guérisseuse a appris ce qui était arrivé à ses condisciples.
description.italian: La guaritrice è venuta a conoscenza del destino dei suoi fratelli.
description.spanish: La sanadora ha descubierto el destino de sus camaradas.
description.schinese: 医师得知了同僚的命运。
description.russian: Целительница выяснила судьбу собратьев.
description.brazilian: A curandeira soube do destino de seus irmãos.

displayName.spanish: Secreto de las Islas de la Medianoche

description.english: You saw all possible endings.
description.german: Du hast alle möglichen Enden gesehen.
description.french: Vous avez vu toutes les fins possibles.
description.italian: Hai visto tutti i possibili finali.
description.spanish: Has visto todos los finales posibles.
description.schinese: 你看到了所有可能的结局。
description.russian: Вы увидели все возможные концовки.
description.brazilian: Você viu todos os finais possíveis.

description.english: You defeated the monster from the chain.
description.german: Du hast das Monster der Kette besiegt.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le monstre de la chaîne.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il mostro della catena.
description.spanish: Has derrotado al monstruo de la cadena.
description.schinese: 你击败了锁链中的怪物。
description.russian: Вы победили чудовище из цепи.
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o monstro das correntes.

description.english: You caught a tailwind.
description.german: Du hast Rückenwind erhalten.
description.french: Vous avez pris un vent arrière.
description.italian: Hai sfruttato il vento in poppa.
description.spanish: Te has beneficiado de un viento.
description.schinese: 你得到了顺风的助力。
description.russian: Вы поймали попутный ветер.
description.brazilian: Você se beneficiou de um vento favorável.

description.english: You caught 15 different tailwinds.
description.german: Du hast 15 verschiedene Rückenwinde erhalten.
description.french: Vous avez pris 15 vents arrière différents.
description.italian: Hai sfruttato 15 venti diversi.
description.spanish: Te has beneficiado de 15 vientos diferentes.
description.schinese: 你得到了15种不同顺风的助力。
description.russian: Вы поймали 15 разных попутных ветров.
description.brazilian: Você se beneficiou de 15 ventos favoráveis diferentes.

description.english: You caught all possible tailwinds.
description.german: Du hast alle Rückenwinde erhalten.
description.french: Vous avez pris tous les vents arrière possibles.
description.italian: Hai sfruttato tutti i possibili venti.
description.spanish: Te has beneficiado de todos los vientos posibles.
description.schinese: 你得到了所有顺风的助力。
description.russian: Вы поймали все возможные попутные ветра.
description.brazilian: Você se beneficiou de todos os ventos favoráveis possíveis.

description.english: You stole the treasure from the pirates.
description.german: Du hast den Schatz der Piraten gestohlen.
description.french: Vous avez volé le trésor des pirates.
description.italian: Hai rubato il tesoro ai pirati.
description.spanish: Has robado el tesoro de los piratas.
description.schinese: 你抢走了海盗的财宝。
description.russian: Вы отобрали у пиратов их сокровище.
description.brazilian: Você roubou o tesouro dos piratas.

description.english: You helped save the soul of the old monster.
description.german: Du hast geholfen, die Seele des alten Monsters zu retten.
description.french: Vous avez aidé à sauver l'âme du vieux monstre.
description.italian: Hai contribuito a salvare l'anima del vecchio mostro.
description.spanish: Has ayudado a salvar el alma de un viejo monstruo.
description.schinese: 你帮忙拯救了老怪物的灵魂。
description.russian: Вы помогли спасти душу старого чудовища.
description.brazilian: Você ajudou a salvar a alma do velho monstro.

description.english: You found and defeated the most elusive monster in the Midnight Isles.
description.german: Du hast das scheueste Monster der Mitternachtsinseln besiegt.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé et vaincu le monstre le plus insaisissable des Îles de Minuit.
description.italian: Hai trovato e sconfitto il mostro più inafferrabile delle Isole della Mezzanotte.
description.spanish: Has encontrado y derrotado al monstruo más esquivo de las Islas de la Medianoche.
description.schinese: 你找到并击败了午夜群岛最行踪飘忽的怪物。
description.russian: Вы нашли и победили самое неуловимое чудовище Полуночных островов.
description.brazilian: Você encontrou e derrotou o monstro mais evasivo das Ilhas da Meia-Noite.

description.english: You defeated Star Rattle.
description.german: Du hast Sternenrassel besiegt.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu Hochet stellaire.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Sonaglio Stellare.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Sonajero Estelar.
description.schinese: 你击败了星辰摇铃。
description.russian: Вы победили Звездную погремушку.
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o Chocalho Estelar.

description.english: You defeated the Archpriest.
description.german: Du hast den Erzpriester besiegt.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu l'archiprêtre.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il Sommo Sacerdote.
description.spanish: Has derrotado al sumo sacerdote.
description.schinese: 你击败了大祭司。
description.russian: Вы победили Первослужителя.
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o Sumo Sacerdote.

description.english: You defeated the Songbird.
description.german: Du hast den Singvogel besiegt.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le rossignol.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto l'Uccello Canterino.
description.spanish: Has derrotado al ave cantora.
description.schinese: 你击败了鸣禽。
description.russian: Вы победили Певчую птицу.
description.brazilian: Você derrotou a Cantave.

description.english: You defeated the first guardian of the islands.
description.german: Du hast den ersten Wächter der Inseln besiegt.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le premier gardien des îles.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il primo guardiano delle isole.
description.spanish: Has derrotado al primer guardián de las islas.
description.schinese: 你击败了群岛的第一个守卫。
description.russian: Вы победили первого из стражей островов.
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o primeiro guardião das ilhas.

description.english: You equipped two items that form a set.
description.german: Du hast zwei Gegenstände ausgerüstet, die ein Set bilden.
description.french: Vous vous êtes équipé de deux objets formant un ensemble.
description.italian: Hai equipaggiato due oggetti che formano un set.
description.spanish: Has equipado dos objetos que forman un conjunto.
description.schinese: 你装备了两件成套的物品。
description.russian: Вы экипировали вместе два предмета, образующие набор.
description.brazilian: Você equipou dois itens que formam um conjunto.

description.english: You triumphed in the final battle without using siege weapons.
description.german: Du hast in der letzten Schlacht ohne den Einsatz von Belagerungswaffen triumphiert.
description.french: Vous avez remporté le dernier combat sans utiliser d'armes de siège.
description.italian: Hai trionfato nella battaglia finale senza armi d'assedio.
description.spanish: Has triunfado en la batalla final sin usar armas de asedio.
description.schinese: 你没有使用攻城武器就赢得了最终决战。
description.russian: Вы победили в финальной битве, не использовав осадные орудия.
description.brazilian: Você triunfou na batalha final sem usar armas de cerco.

description.english: You defeated the monster from the chain on the first attempt.
description.german: Du hast das Monster der Kette beim ersten Versuch besiegt.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le monstre de la chaîne dès votre première tentative.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il mostro della catena al primo tentativo.
description.spanish: Has derrotado al monstruo de la cadena en tu primer intento.
description.schinese: 你只尝试一次就击败了锁链中的怪物。
description.russian: Вы победили чудовище из цепи с первой попытки.
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o monstro das correntes na primeira tentativa.

description.english: You defeated Star Rattle without being injured by the flowers.
description.german: Du hast Sternenrassel besiegt, ohne von den Blumen verletzt zu werden.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu Hochet stellaire sans subir de dégâts des fleurs.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Sonaglio Stellare senza essere ferito dai fiori.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Sonajero Estelar sin sufrir daños por las flores.
description.schinese: 你击败星辰摇铃时没有被花朵伤到。
description.russian: Вы победили Звездную погремушку, не получив урона от цветов.
description.brazilian: Você derrotou o Chocalho Estelar sem sofrer danos das flores.

description.english: You defeated the Songbird using her scream.
description.german: Du hast den Singvogel mit ihrem Schrei besiegt.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le rossignol en utilisant son cri.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto l'Uccello Canterino usando il suo urlo.
description.spanish: Has usado el grito del ave cantora para derrotarla.
description.schinese: 你利用鸣禽的尖叫打败了她。
description.russian: Вы победили Певчую птицу с помощью ее же крика.
description.brazilian: Você derrotou a Cantave usando o próprio grito dela.

description.english: You fought the monster from the chain when your voyage had barely begun.
description.german: Du hast das Monster der Kette gleich zu Beginn deiner Reise bekämpft.
description.french: Vous avez combattu le monstre de la chaîne au tout début de votre voyage.
description.italian: Hai combattuto il mostro della catena quando il tuo viaggio era appena iniziato.
description.spanish: Te has enfrentado al monstruo de la cadena cuando tu viaje apenas había empezado.
description.schinese: 你在航程刚一开始就与锁链中的怪物战斗。
description.russian: Вы сразились с чудовищем из цепи, когда ваше путешествие едва началось.
description.brazilian: Você enfrentou o monstro das correntes quando sua jornada estava apenas começando.

displayName.italian: La Ricchezza è il Miglior Superpotere
displayName.spanish: El mejor superpoder es la riqueza

description.english: You sold a Nahyndrian crystal.
description.german: Du hast einen Nahyndriankristall verkauft!
description.french: Vous avez vendu un cristal nahyndrien.
description.italian: Hai venduto un cristallo nahyndriano.
description.spanish: Has vendido un cristal nahyndriano.
description.schinese: 你卖掉了一块奈罕翠水晶。
description.russian: Вы продали нахиндрианский кристалл.
description.brazilian: Você vendeu um cristal Nahyndriano.

displayName.french: Mortel dans tous les sens du terme

description.english: You triumphed in the final battle without mythic powers and without being a legend.
description.german: Du hast in der letzten Schlacht ohne Legendenkräfte und ohne eine Legende zu sein triumphiert.
description.french: Vous avez remporté le dernier combat sans pouvoir mythique et sans être une légende.
description.italian: Hai trionfato nella battaglia finale senza poteri mitici e senza essere una leggenda.
description.spanish: Vence en la batalla final sin poderes míticos y sin ser una leyenda.
description.schinese: 在取得最终决战胜利时，你既没有神话力量，也未成为传奇。
description.russian: Вы победили в финальной битве, не имея мифических уровней и не будучи легендой.
description.brazilian: Você triunfou na batalha final sem poderes míticos e sem ser uma lenda.

displayName.spanish: De las fauces de la derrota

description.english: You triumphed in the final battle when all seemed lost.
description.german: Du hast in der letzten Schlacht triumphiert, als schon alles verloren schien.
description.french: Vous avez remporté le dernier combat alors que tout espoir semblait perdu.
description.italian: Hai trionfato nella battaglia finale quando tutto sembrava perduto.
description.spanish: Has triunfado en la batalla final cuando todo parecía perdido.
description.schinese: 你在万念俱灰之际赢得了最终决战。
description.russian: Вы победили в финальной битве, хотя казалось, что все уже потеряно.
description.brazilian: Você triunfou na batalha final quando tudo parecia perdido.

description.english: You killed the giant worm in its lair.
description.german: Du hast den Riesenwurm in seinem Bau getötet.
description.french: Vous avez tué le ver géant dans son antre.
description.italian: Hai ucciso il verme gigante nella sua tana.
description.spanish: Mata al gusano gigante en su guarida.
description.schinese: 你在巨虫的巢穴中将其杀死。
description.russian: Вы убили гигантского червя в его логове.
description.brazilian: Você matou o verme gigante em seu covil.

description.english: You found all of the forest warden's notes.
description.german: Du hast alle Notizen des Waldhüters gefunden.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé toutes les notes du gardien de la forêt.
description.italian: Hai trovato tutti gli appunti del guardiano della foresta.
description.spanish: Has encontrado todas las notas del guardabosques.
description.schinese: 你找到了守林人的所有笔记。
description.russian: Вы нашли все записки лесника.
description.brazilian: Você encontrou todas as anotações do guardião da floresta.

description.english: You cleansed the forest of all corruption.
description.german: Du hast den Wald von der Verderbnis befreit.
description.french: Vous avez purifié la forêt de toute la corruption.
description.italian: Hai purificato la foresta da ogni corruzione.
description.spanish: Has purgado toda la corrupción del bosque.
description.schinese: 你净化了森林中的所有腐化。
description.russian: Вы очистили лес от порчи.
description.brazilian: Você purificou a floresta de toda a corrupção.

description.english: You removed the corpse from the tree without alerting the monsters in the lake.
description.german: Du hast die Leiche vom Baum entfernt, ohne das Monster im See zu wecken.
description.french: Vous avez retiré le cadavre de l'arbre sans alerter les monstres du lac.
